title: Requires health care professional education in the area of elder abuse
summary: Requires physicians, chiropractors, dentists, registered nurses, podiatrists, optometrists, psychiatrists, psychologists, and dental hygienists to have completed one hour of coursework or training regarding the identification and reporting of elderly abuse prior to the renewal of a license, registration or limited permit; provides procedures and provides for exemptions when no need therefor.

    3  COURSEWORK OR TRAINING SHALL INCLUDE, BUT NOT BE LIMITED TO, INFORMATION

    9  "ELDER  ABUSE  AND  MALTREATMENT"  MEANS  PHYSICAL  ABUSE, SEXUAL ABUSE,

   20  required  training.  The  department shall provide an exemption from the
